attributes.action: vito Tony Blair's attempt to become European President
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We oppose all Tony Blair’s attempts to become President of Europe because his appointment would mean further erosion of the valuable separation between American and European policy on defence and trade affairs. 

Tony Blair's history of judgements in international matters means such an appointment would create complex internal conflict. His record of submission to American interests in international economic policy and global conflicts -notably Iraq, Israel and Palestine - has proven him ill-equipped to ably represent the interests of Europe.

rejection.details: The request is based on a hypothetical situation.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
